short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces `Flow Production Tracking` with `SG` on all pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply replaces instances of "Flow Production Tracking" text with the string "SG" to help reduce visual clutter when browsing "Flow Production Tracking" aka Shotgrid aka Shotgun documentation pages.
